sentence.Network_en: The optimal conditions of the extraction of the flavonoids from Elaeagnus angustifolia L.
sentence.Network_cn: 对沙枣花中的有效成分黄酮类化合物的最佳提取条件进行了研究.

sentence.Network_en: The Elaeagnus mollis seed oil was extracted by Soxhlet extraction and the oil yield was 32.50 %.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用索氏提取法提取翅果油树种子油,其出油率为32.50%.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To study the conditions of extracting flavonoids from the branches of Elaeagnus angustifolia L.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的以青海当地沙枣枝为原料,对其中黄酮类化合物进行了提取研究.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 胡颓子属（elaeagnus）(Elaeagnus)是被子植物门木兰纲胡颓子科下的一个属，该属多为常绿或落叶灌木或小乔木。该属共有2组80种。
